org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.transformation.core.transformations

Class TransformationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.papyrus.designer.transformation.core.transformations.TransformationContext

  • public class TransformationContext
extends Object
    Return information about the current values in the context of a transformation e.g. the current instance, the current port (container transformation), ...
